full_summary:
# Tender Invitation: Filters and O-Rings
==========================================

## Tender Details

* **Title (English/French)**: Filters and O-Rings / Filtres et joints toriques
* **Reference Number**: cb-5698-50576155
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-249115/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-14, 14:00 PM (Local Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-31
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31


## Tender Status

* **Status (English/French)**: Expired / Expiré
* **Notice Type (English/French)**: Request for Proposal / Demande de propositions
* **Procurement Method (English/French)**: Competitive - Open bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price / Prix le plus bas


## Contracting Entity

* **Name (English/French)**: Department of National Defence / Ministère de la Défense nationale
* **Address (English/French)**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2 / 101 promenade Colonel By, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2


## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supplies listed below. The delivery is requested at: Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St E, Montreal, Quebec H1N 1V9 and Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5.

Submissions must be made in English or French. Electronic receipt of bids is permitted by e-mail only. Please review the solicitation document for further details on submission.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Bidders may submit questions or clarification requests to Alexander Reynolds at alexander.reynolds@forces.gc.ca.

## Attachments
